segments.text: I see a domestic scene, but it's riddled with ignored problems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just relentlessly flowing from the faucet, quite a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame to see so much water spilling onto the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems to be in her own world, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got that dish towel wrapped around a plate, just polishing away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are definitely up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how dedicated they are to their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really stretching to get those cookies, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could collapse any second, which is concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is just waiting patiently, hand out, ready for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, getting cookies without permission, I'm sure of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get caught when the water finally reaches the woman's attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of childhood mischief and adult distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR
